title: Gifting Skin
body: If i gift a skin to  someone on the old client, will it show up in the new beta client? Since the only way to gift is on the old client.

replies.body: Both clients are on the live server so you will unlock a gift on the updated client.  Keep in mind that toasts might not be enabled yet so you might not get a cool screen fanfare about your gift.  Hope that helps clear things up!
